Address.Address1: 2 NORTH SI HUAN WEST ROAD, HAIDIAN DISTRICT

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Liaoning International Hotel places you in the heart of Beijing, convenient to Tsinghua University and Zhongguancun Electronics City. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Big Bell Temple and Peking University.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned guestrooms. Conveniences include irons/ironing boards, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including a nightclub, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).


Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is 12:00 PM
Grab a bite from a grocery/convenience store, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tsinghua University - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Zhongguancun Electronics City - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Big Bell Temple - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Peking University - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Old Summer Palace - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Five Pagoda Temple - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
National Aquatics Center - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Beijing Aquarium - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
National Indoor Stadium - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
China National Convention Center - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Xin'ao Shopping Center - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
National Stadium - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Beijing Zoo - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Capital Indoor Stadium - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Olympic Sports Center - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi

The preferred airport for Liaoning International Hotel is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 24.3 km / 15.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
